participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Energetic and optimistic, looking forward to independence.
participant_1.background: I am 19 and I cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. I just want to have fun with my friends. I do not drink or do drugs or anything. I work; I have a part-time job at Burger King.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Caring and down-to-earth, enjoys a simple rural life.
participant_2.background: I have a German Shepherd dog. I live in a rural farming community. My husband is adopted. I like to watch NHL hockey.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
me too. after a long day of work, i like to watch hockey. what about you?
